effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 589,318.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description:
Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 2.4 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 691,560, and grants you up to 11,437 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
